extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Zabbix Server Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Zabbix Server version is within the affected range (6.4.0 to 6.4.15 or 7.0.0alpha1 to 7.0.0rc2).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Zabbix Server version affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Zabbix Server
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to Zabbix version 6.4.16rc1 or 7.0.0rc3 immediately, as no workarounds are available.
